promo.promoText:
Join today and claim straight away* on a range of extras:

  • general dental
  • physio
  • chiro
  • remedial massage

Offer available until 31st December

*Conditions apply
promo.discountText: nib offers a 4% discount to customers who choose to pay their premium by direct debit from a bank account. This has been included in the price shown.
